# credit-union

ini adalah projek tugas akhir yang saya buat menggunakan bahasa programming php (native), pada aplikasi ini dibuat dengan tujuan mempermudah petugas dan anggota koperasi dengan membuat sistem pembayaran online dan juga pengingat pembayaran angsuran. sistem ini juga bertujuan untuk menggantikan sistem manual yaitu pencatatan seluruh data didalam buku menjadi sistem yang seluruh datanya tersimpan di database dan dapat diakses darimana saja

# fitur

pada aplikasi ini terdapat beberapa fitur diantaranya :

  1. midtrans payments
  2. sms & wa gateway
# login page

pada login page juga terdapat menu untuk mendaftar sebagai admin baru. pada bagian ini yang dapat mendaftar adalah admin baru yang telah terdaftar pada koperasi

# dashboard admin

pada bagian ini terdapat 2 card yang berisikan data anggota yang memiliki tanggungan membayar angsuran dan anggota yang memiliki deposit yang siap dicairkan. pada bagian ini terdapat button kirim pesan yang berfungsi untuk mengirimkan pesan pengingat untuk membayar dan mencairkan dana.

# dashboard anggota koperasi

pada bagian ini terdapat card-card terkait jenis program koperasi yang dimiliki anggota koperasi. dan pada card angsuran dapat diklik untuk membayar angsuran (jika ada)

# halama checkout

pada bagian ini adalah halaman untuk melakukan pembayaran, pada bagian ini anggota koperasi dapat melakukan pembayaran online menggunakan midtrans dengan qris gopay

# halama payment

pada halaman ini anggota koperasi hanya melakukan scan qr code untuk melakukan transaksi. dan ketika berhasil melakukan pembayaran maka sistem secara automatis direct ke halaman success transaction. dan secara direct pesan transaksi akan masuk whatsapp anggota koperasi

# pesan reminder (pengingat)

berikut adalah pesan pengingat angsuran pinjaman

# follow me

follow me on social media

readme:
mini project 2
-


French theron and sidonie buttout

rolling of a part

interactive menu:
-
- play the character with the right and left arrows,
to play the team of your choice "mount" in the tank by stopping for a second on the tank. this step can be skip using the n key, you will be assigned the team ally automatically.
- thanks to the space key the character can take a bike and move faster! fantastic, right?

Game:
-
- each player has 4 units of different types (tank, soldier, rocket, ambulance).

Allied players can:
-
- move the cursor with the arrows.
- select a unit by entering.
- then choose an end position in the range (with the help of arrows) and press enter again.
- select an action from the proposed one
action desired: no effect
action attack (all units): select an enemie unit using arrows and press enter
action heal (ambulance only): select an allied unit with the help of arrows and press enter.
- the units used are shaded (each can be used once per turn).
- the player can finish his turn with the tab key.

game mechanics:
-
- putting your units on certain components of the game will allow you to win defense but also win the game! Use your cursor to see which spots bring the most defense.

ia:
-
- the enemy player plays automatically by bringing each of his units as close as possible to an opponent and then attacking him (note: the ambulance heals instead).

Game system:
-
- the tricks go on until a player has no unity. the area then changes for a second part. at the end of the game, the game ends and displays game over.

keys for the curious:
-
- tab can be used to finish the current player's turn at any time.
- n allows you to start the next part (only works on the menu and the first area, since then there is no next part).
- r allows to reset the game and therefore restart the first part.

Specific features of extensions:
-
- the rocket has the peculiarity of little to move (ray of 1) but to be able to shoot away and strong (ray of attack of 5, damage of 8).
- the ambulance helps to heal its allies (healing of 3), but can only attack weakly (damage of 1).
- at the beginning of the game the player looks away, enjoy as once moved he will no longer look at the landscape. :)
Don't forget to make him win so he comes back to admire the landscape more often.

readme:
application of methods for generating three-dimensional regular grids to account for the curvilinear anisotropy of the material ####**The essence of work** visualization of dynamic deformation of composite material with specified strength properties ####**The purpose of the job** calculation, construction and correct visualization of *** surfaces of kunsa*** (2d case), as well as the extension of the two-dimensional representation to the three-dimensional case, i.e. the composite itself. #### **annotation and visual results** The file `coonslinearsurface_2d.js` presents the construction of the surface of the kunsa, 4 boundaries of which are given by natural cubic splines, in several ways: algebraic method consisting in transfinite interpolation of boundary curves, parametric coordinates can be given in three different ways: uniform, chord and centripetal; - differential method based on the method of solving a two-dimensional quasi-static problem mdt from the MS course using a mechanical analogy, and solving the obtained equations through finite-difference schemes. * undeformed grid in (x,y)*

*undeformed mesh (counce surface) in (x,y,z)*

*laying nets on the deformed surface of the kunsa in (x,y,z) at ŒΩ=0.4*

Deformed mesh (coon surface) in (x,y,z)*

The file `coonslinearsurface_3d.js` reflects the results of extending these methods to a three-dimensional case. * undeformed grid of a unit cube in (x,y,z)*

Deformed grid in (x,y,z) at ŒΩ=0.4*

#### 1. in both ".html" files, it is possible to selectively display the elements under construction, such as control points, control lines, node points of the grid, grid lines, surfaces, and the result of the work is their visual comparison. 2. the rotation animation is made using quaternions, not css tools. ### - the method of generating a grid on the surface of the kunsa is programmed (algebraic method of transfinite interpolation on a single square); - developed and programmed a method of generating a grid in a two-dimensional case (differential method based on a mechanical analogy on a single square); The method of transfinite interpolation is extended to a three-dimensional case (single cube); The method of mechanical analogy is extended to a three-dimensional case (single cube); - each case and method is visualized separately in one figure to compare the results of the grid construction; - the possibility of dynamic change of the poisson coefficient is added to compare the results of grid construction.

readme:
# metadata image files and steganography

Introduction
This project was carried out by damodarane jean-baptist and elumalai sriguru, students in computer 2 degree within group c. it is based on the concept of steganography, a technique aimed at concealing information, such as messages, within digital media, mainly image files.



**java version**

for this project, we selected with the version `javase-11`

## use and execution in click mode

This project can be run in click mode on the console using a jar file.
Open your linux console.
the file name is: `mycli.jar`
In click mode, the user can:

1. explore a folder, whose name will be passed into argument or the user will have to put a '.'
command to type:
```
java -jar mycli.jar -d .
```
ou 

```
java -jar mycli.jar -d images
```

2. afficher les m√©tadonn√©es d'un fichier image dont le nom sera pass√© en argument
commande √† taper : 
```
java -jar mycli.jar nom_image.png
```

3. cacher un message/texte dans une image, le message et le nom de l'image seront pass√©s en argument
commande √† taper : 
```
java -jar mycli.jar -f nom_image.png -s "message_secret"
```

4. extraire le message dissimul√© dans l'image, le nom de l'image contenant le message cach√© sera pass√© en argument
commande √† taper : 
```

```

5. pour avoir des aides
commande √† taper : 
```

```


## utilisation et ex√©cutions en mode gui

rhythm break is a project carried out by damodarane jean-baptist and elumalai sriguru, second-year graduate students of computer science, at cy cergy paris university as part of the module of **web development 2021/2022**.

[cy cergy paris universitaire](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/6/69/logo_cy_cergy_paris_universit%c3%a9.svg/129px-logo_cy_cergy_paris_universit%c3%a9.svg.png)

- https://damodaranejb.alwaysdata.net/
- https://elumalai.alwaysdata.net/

we used a free platform for hosting our website: **[alwaysdata](https://alwaysdata.com)** .

# trombinoscope - draft end of license

## mit license
[![license: mit](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-mit-yellow.svg)](https://opensource.org/licenses/mit)

## project description

as part of our third year of computer license at cy cergy paris university, our team has developed a trombinoscope using php in the integration project module. This platform allows users to visualize student faces and information intuitively. In addition, we have integrated a teaching evaluation feature by students to improve the quality of teaching.

## main features

- visualisation and complete management of students: consult the students' faces and detailed information in a user-friendly way.

- evaluation of teaching: students can evaluate courses and provide feedback to teachers to improve the quality of teaching.

## technologies used

- php
- psql

## configuration and installation

- clone the restitory: git clone https://github.com/jeanbaptist02/trombinoscope

- Start the php server: ```php -s localhost:8000```

## user guide

- Access the application via your browser: http://localhost:8000.

## project creators

- [jean-baptist](https://github.com/jeanbaptist02)
- [sriguru](https://github.com/sriguru95)
- [nihar](#)
- [victor](https://github.com/seed4616)

readme:
# project dungeon descriiler

# # description

project the end of class bachelor informatics of university amikom yogyakarta
for an algorithm & programming course. This project is a text-based game
Aim to defeat the monsters in the dungeon.
This game was created using c + + programming language.

# # how to build

dependents:
- cmake
- python3.10 (for conan)
- c + + compiler (msvc for windows, gcc for linux)
- conan
- Shh.
- nlohmann _ json

# # # how to build dependents

Make sure conan is installed on your computer. If not, please install conan first.


1. Run detection conan profile
```bash
conan profile detect
```

2. install dependencies
```bash
conan install . --build=missing -c tools.system.package_manager:mode=install -c tools.system.package_manager:sudo=true
```

3. build project
```bash
cmake . -dcmake_build_type=debug -dcmake_project_top_level_includes="conan_provider.cmake"
```
readme_before:
# project dungeon despoiler

## description

project tugas akhir kelas bachelor informatics dari universitas amikom yogyakarta
untuk mata kuliah algorithm & programming. project ini merupakan game berbasis text yang 
bertujuan untuk mengalahkan monster-monster yang ada di dalam dungeon. 
game ini dibuat menggunakan bahasa pemrograman c++.

## how to build

dependencies:
- cmake
- python3.10 (for conan)
- c++ compiler (msvc for windows, gcc for linux)
- conan
- sdl
- nlohmann_json

### how to build dependencies

pastikan conan sudah terinstall di komputer anda. jika belum, silahkan install conan terlebih dahulu.


1. jalankan deteksi profile conan
```bash
conan profile detect
```

2. install dependencies
```bash
conan install . --build=missing -c tools.system.package_manager:mode=install -c tools.system.package_manager:sudo=true
```

3. build project
```bash
cmake . -dcmake_build_type=debug -dcmake_project_top_level_includes="conan_provider.cmake"
```

cascavell ====== cascavell is a c-based programming language concept that uses spaces to define code blocks. developed using yacc/bison and flex.

--- about ------ cascavell is a programming language concept developed as the final project of the compiler discipline, in the bachelor's degree in computer science at the federal university of abc. the purpose of the language is to use indentation as code blocks delimiters and omit '**;**', characteristic of c language. it is an implementation of c language with less resources, inspired by python language. the extension of the language files is **.cll**. in this repository are the specifications of the lexical and syntactic analyzer for cascavell language. # Symbols and reserved words the language has bit-a-bit operators, logical operators and arithmetic operators. operators have their precedence defined based on language c: ==References====External links== where the level of precedence ranges from 1 to 14, 1 being the highest possible precedence. the reserved words are used to define types of variables and functions and perform control of the program flow: # Syntax of language language requires the use of parentheses if it requires nesting of ternary operators. functions must have a blank line between their settings. --- installation and use ------ # Prerequisites # for it is possible to compile the analyzers it is necessary to have flex and bison/yacc installed. to install: ```console $ sudo apt-get update $ sudo apt-get install flex $ sudo apt-get install bison ``` para executar o compilador √© necess√°rio um compilador de c. ### executando os analisadores para executar os analisadores, entre na pasta da vers√£o desejada: ```console $ cd c.version ``` ou ```console $ cd cpp.version ``` e digite: ```console $ make full ``` esse comando utilizar√° o flex e o bison para gerar os analisadores, criar√° a vers√£o execut√°vel e automaticamente ir√° acessar a pasta _exemplos_, gerando um arquivo log para cada um dos c√≥digos de exemplo da linguagem. ---

this repository refers to a research project that seeks to understand and characterize the isolation and explosion patterns of spatial segregation of racial groups separated by different income ranges in Brazilian metropolises. we analyzed the black and white groups of five income ranges classified between a and, in the metropolis of s√£o paulo, rio de janeiro, belo horizonte, recife and porto alegre.

------------------------------------- Project structure md < - main project documentation with general information to manipulate the repository. Date txt <- package requests to use running scripts on the local host (python) ------------------------------------- Team: - author: [priscilla santos](https://www.linkedin.com/in/priscilla-santoss/) - advisor and co-author: [flavia f. fesa](https://flaviafeitosa.wordpress.com/) - co-advisor and co-author: [joana barros](https://www.bbk.ac.uk/our-staff/profile/8008655/joana-barros#overview) - co-author: [flavia lisboa](http://lattes.cnpq.br/3860822725559503) # References: - [gate](https://gateufabc.wixsite.com/gate/search) - [bacharelate in territorial planning](https://gradacao.ufabc.edu.br/bpt/) - [Federal university of abc](https://www.ufabc.edu.br/)

esse reposit√≥rio refere-se a um projeto de pesquisa que busca entender e caracterizar os padr√µes de isolamento e explosi√ß√£o da segrega√ß√£o espacial de grupos raciais separado por diferentes faixas de renda em metr√≥poles brasileiras. foram analisados os grupos negros e brancos, de cinco faixas de renda classificadas entre a e e, na metr√≥poles de s√£o paulo, rio de janeiro, belo horizonte, recife e porto alegre.

# 1 project csrf

## 1.1 scenario 1 - csrf exploit

### Step 1: Start docker containers

```bash
$ git checkout csrf-1/csrf-vulnerability-example
$ cd csrf/docker
```
- **linux**: `path/to/docker $ ./up.sh`
- **windows**: `path/to/docker> up.bat`

### stap 2: de csrf-aanval

1. surf naar [http://localhost:8081](http://localhost:8081)
2. kies een gebruiker en meld je aan
3. (optioneel) klik op de knop `wijzigen` en wijzig het e-mailadres
4. surf naar [http://localhost:8082](http://localhost:8082)
5. volg de instructies voor een csrf-aanval
6. ververs de webapplicatie op de _trusted server_: het e-mailadres moet `forged@bybadguy.example.com` worden. **de csrf-aanval is gelukt!**

### stap 3: docker-containers stoppen

- **linux**: `path/to/docker $ ./down.sh`
- **windows**: `path/to/docker> down.bat`

## 1.2 scenario 2 - csrf-mitigatie

![custom badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/security-csrf-purple.svg)

```bash
$ git checkout csrf-1/csrf-token-example
$ cd csrf/docker
```
dezelfde stappen herhalen zoals bij [1.1 scenario 1 - csrf-exploit](#11-scenario-1---csrf-exploit).
de csrf-aanval mislukt.

# 2 project oauth-jwt

![custom badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/web%20application-http%3a%2f%2flocalhost%3a8083-crimson.svg) ![custom badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/web%20api-http%3a%2f%2flocalhost%3a8083%2fapi-crimson.svg) ![custom badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/token%20endpoint-http%3a%2f%2flocalhost%3a8083%2fauth-crimson.svg)

## 2.1 scenario 3 - tokens opslaan in localstorage

![custom badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/security-oauth%202-purple.svg) ![custom badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/security-jws-purple.svg)

### stap 1: node.js server starten 

```bash
$ git checkout oauth-1/oauth-ropc-initial
$ cd oauth/webapp
$ node app
```

### stap 2: toegangstoken aanvragen

1. surf naar [http://localhost:8083](http://localhost:8083), klik op `localstorage weergeven`: het zal leeg zijn.
2. meldt u aan. u wordt omgeleid naar de homepagina.
3. klik vervolgens opnieuw op `localstorage weergeven`: een toegangstoken (jwt) wordt weergegeven, uitgegeven door het token endpoint (**resource owner password credentials grant type**).
4. wijzig het e-mailadres. het zal succesvol gewijzigd worden.

readme:
# IT project l3 - reindeer 1 2017/2018

## subject
makemyquiz, quiz creation software.

#authors
- maxime lambert - [profile](https://github.com/magikarplvl5)
- josie signe - [profile](https://github.com/darlysia)
- leo rouzic - [profile](https://github.com/morphaning)
- Dovid fox--calzant - [profile](https://github.com/chacrex)
- sahid christophus - [profile](https://github.com/markhum)

### project goal

makemyquiz is a quiz design software mainly designed for entertainment purposes, especially during animations in bars, playrooms, etc... but also for the field of education.
the software is designed to be played with remote controls but any controllers compatible with your computer can substitute these remote controls.

Prerequisite

- unity community 2018.1.1f1 (https://unity3d.com/)
- windows 7+: 64 or 32 bits

Functions

- [x] up to 8 participating teams
- [x] points calculation and bonus management
- [x] Sleeve-subject-question organization
- [x] different types of questions:
- [x] multiple choices
- [x] music recognition
- [x] image recognition
- [x] true - fake
- internationalization
- [x] speed mode
- [x] equality management
- [x] automatic backup/backup


### user guide

link: [use guide](documents/use guide.pdf)
(available in the documents folder)
contact us: makemyquiz.serviceapresfun@gmail.com
nb: download the document to access hyperlinks and the plan.

Gallery
![image1](https://i.imgur.com/vijdwow.jpg)

< br >

# # execution guide

1. be located in the work folder:
```
cd catkin_racecar
```

2. generar el entorno de trabajo:
```
source devel/setup.bash:
```

3. ejeuctar el control mediante mando:
```
roslaunch racecar_control gazebo_sim_joy.launch
```

4. ejecutar el algoritmo de seguimiento:
```
rosrun path_tracker follower.py
```
